Why in the name of the all mighty, we do not have line Numbers
for the CDT classes !!!

Any way redirected to sean, the lord of the managed builder.

Problem here is that the plugin version in head contains a major, minor, and 
service component only, i.e. 2.0.0. The version identifier from the build 
contains a qualifier, so it reads 2.0.0.<build_id>. The strict checking I was 
doing for the identifier passed all my tests, but I did not check the 
qualifier. Now I do and the new project wizard should function just fine.
